description: Designed and built a modular end-to-end (E2E) test framework for Self-Hosted Sentry, reducing test execution time to 3 minutes through asynchronous execution. Enabled continuous health monitoring via scheduled cron jobs. Automated test workflows to achieve a 10x speedup and integrated them with CI/CD pipelines. Provisioned SignalFx dashboards and detectors using Terraform, ensuring seamless observability integration.
